example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 公众)) (VP (ADVP (AD 依然)) (VP (BA 把) (IP-OBJ (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 泰森)) (VP (VV 当做) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (LCP-LOC (NP (NN 拳坛)) (LC 上)) (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 狠)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 家伙))))))))
